Uses of Class
Screens.Screen

  • Packages that use Screen 
    Package Description
    Main  
    Screens  

    • Uses of Screen in Main

      Methods in Main that return Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Screen DrawingSurface.getScreen​(int i)
      Gets a specified Screen object.

    • Uses of Screen in Screens

      Subclasses of Screen in Screens 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GameScreen
      The GameScreen class combines all the Sprites together to run the actual game.
      class  InstructionScreen
      This is the instructions screen that is displayed when the instructions button is clicked from other screens in the game
      class  MainScreen
      This is the main screen that is run at the beginning of the program, and is the first screen the user interacts with
      class  PauseScreen
      This is the pause screen that is displayed when the player(s) pause the game from the game screen
      class  ShopScreen
      This is the Shop Screen which is displayed before the game begins when the runners and hunters choose their guns and shields
      class  WinScreen
      This is the Win Screen which is displayed when the game has ended and a certain character (hunter or runner) has won
